episodes.title: Is my workplace a cult?
episodes.description:
In this video I discuss the idea that a workplace can become a cult.  This is just a brief overview of some thoughts I have had and I may do a more detailed vide on this in the future. 

I am a cult recovery therapist and cult psychology consultant.  This channel includes some issues I have been reflecting on related to therapy, cults/extremism, relationships, autism and anything other topic I come across in my journey as a therapist.

More about me...

My Website: www.tothinkagain.co.uk

My Linked-in page: https://www.linkedin.com/in/richard-j-turner/

A show I co-presented on BBC World Service: https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/w3ct4244

When I was interviewed on BBC Radio 5: https://www.bbc.co.uk/sounds/play/p0cdtfnt

episodes.title: Teachings on demons wreck your mind!
episodes.description:
In this video I discuss the damage that exorcism/deliverance ministry can do to a persons mind and their sense of reality and identity.

I am a cult recovery therapist and cult psychology consultant.  This channel includes some issues I have been reflecting on related to therapy, cults/extremism, relationships, autism and anything other topic I come across in my journey as a therapist.

episodes.title: What causes a cult to form?
episodes.description:
In this video I discuss why a cult exists.  I explore how a cult is a mirror of the narcissistic leaders personality and how the leader sets up the group to meet their needs.

I am a cult recovery therapist and cult psychology consultant.  This channel includes some issues I have been reflecting on related to therapy, cults/extremism, relationships, autism and anything other topic I come across in my journey as a therapist.

episodes.title: What is a cult?
episodes.description:
Welcome to my first video!  In this video I answer the question, 'what is a cult?'  There actually isn't s set definition of the word cult but I discuss the working definition I use.

I am a cult recovery therapist and cult psychology consultant.  This channel includes some issues I have been reflecting on related to therapy, cults/extremism, relationships, autism and anything other topic I come across in my journey as a therapist.
